pageContext.description: St Catherine kneels in the centre of the foreground wearing a black dress with a gold brocade collar. The henchman stands behind her and removes her long blond curls from the nape of her neck. A group of figures stands in the middle distance on the right and a further group with two men on horseback is positioned in the middle distance on the left. Another scene from the legend of St Catherine is illustrated in the background. It depicts the storm destroying the wheel on which the saint was to be martyred.
